short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens KiCanvas with the current page URL.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Open with KiCanvas Chrome extension is a simple tool that allows you to open the current GitHub URL in KiCanvas, a web-based viewer for KiCad projects, with just one click or a keyboard shortcut. This makes it easy to quickly view KiCad projects in KiCanvas, providing a streamlined way to inspect designs directly from GitHub without downloading files.

KiCanvas: https://kicanvas.org
KiCad: https://kicad.org
